author: John Sheffield
comment: I have tried a lot of podcast apps, the ease of use and flexibility is better than many I have tried. I have just become a supporter, even though I am still unemployed. Although I still have some memory issues on my older phone (sometimes the cast list don't display or update as they should) but my main issue is that it is a little too easy to accidentally change what is playing if I am listening while scrolling and managing my lists.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Glad to know this app works very well for you. Enjoy your listening!

author: Adri Topol
comment: I really enjoy this app a lot and find it easy to use while I'm driving, but I wish the search was better since you must get the name of the podcast completely right before actually being able to find it. They need more of a google search engine where it doesn't have to be perfect and where it gives suggestions on what you wanted to search up.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. We are working on the server to provide better syncing and search features. Enjoy your listening!

author: JW Smith
comment: Podcast apps are a glaring weakness of the Android platform and this is the best of the worst. It's the least clunky, but there's still some very unnecessary steps in using the app. The most frustrating part is the large episode window that takes up 20% of the screen even when an episode isn't playing and/or has been deleted.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Will improve the UI design for future updates. Would be great if you can share your thoughts or ideas to tech@podcastrepublic.net. Enjoy your listening!

author: Jonathan Cook
comment: i like most everything but very buggy, lately the app will become completely unresponsive and will not let me play anything. i cant even play the podcasts i have downloaded. if these issues get fixed itll be 5 stars

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your bug report. Sorry to hear the update doesn't work well for you. Would be great if you can go to your Android settings and take a bug report and send the bug report to tech@podcastrepublic.net. Thanks.

author: Vikki Beswick
comment: Great app that is the only one I found that allows me to play iTunes podcasts! I like the layout, as other have said it's not completely intuitive but not difficult to navigate, and it's worth it for what it does. Only problem is, and I don't know if it's the app, or this particular podcast, but sometimes skipping forward doesn't work and it just restarts the cast..

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Skipping to a new position requires the podcast media to be encoded probably. Otherwise, it may not be possible or end up with wrong position. You can go to the app Settings and then enable ExoPlayer option under the Media Player settings. Hopefully that fixes with this issue.

author: Michelle Trimborn
comment: Generally good. Problems with getting app to play from oldest newest from a position chosen by user.  When I start listening from NOT the oldest the app doesn't 'follow my lead' and go to the "logical" next in sequence. It jumps back to the oldest in the list. So I can't let it stream episode to episode from my chosen point. I have to end each podcast and then manually select the next one I want to listen to.   The series I am listening to currently is The Infinite Monkey Cage, BBC 4.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. One workaround is to sort the list from oldest to newest so you can play the list from oldest to newest. Hopefully that works for you.

comment: Great app love the features, easily the best podcast app manager player!! One thing which I think is more android auto related, doesn't play the podcasts in correct order in the car even with oldest to newest selected.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Will look into this Android Auto issue and fix it asap. Enjoy your listening!

author: Jason Robeson
comment: Great app, has almost every podcast I could want.  Sometimes it stalls out trying to open podcasts, but it's infrequent so not a huge deal, would be 5 stars if it didn't.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Will look into this freezing issue and fix it asap. Enjoy your listening!

author: Fuli Lu
comment: When I go to top charts, whichever category I choose, it shows there are no podcasts. Please solve this issue. Thanks

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Could you please email to tech@podcastrepublic.net so I can help you resolving this issue better?

author: Anna Karneh
comment: I love podcasts and listen to them for about least 3-5 hours a day. Podcast Republic is the best Android platform to listen to podcasts stress free with no technical glitches while offering so many flexible options. It's easy to search for, find and organize podcasts in this app.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Glad to know this app works very well for you. Enjoy your listening!

comment: I gave this 5 stars 3 years ago and it still deserves those 5 stars. The layout takes a bit of getting used to, but it's worth the effort and is jam-packed with great features

comment: Truly the one podcast app to rule them all. Every time I think there is something it can't do, a few minutes later I discover that it can.

author: Paul Stern
comment: A little complicated to learn but it works very well and has every feature I could want. The best podcast app I've tried.

author: Vasiliy Artamonov
comment: That's a really good app, but the issue is that I can not download any podcast directly to SD. That is why I set 3 stars instead of 5. Please fix.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. This app support to save downloads to SD card. Please go to the settings of this app and then select a directory on the SD card as the download directory. That's it. Please email to tech@podcastrepublic.net if you still have issues with saving to SD card. Thanks.

author: Keith Partridge
comment: Really good app. Can't rate or review podcasts, you can only heart them which is kind of lame. Add rate/review for five stars.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Will add rate/review feature for future updates. Enjoy your listening!

author: Cici DuBose
comment: Excellent UI and functionality. It actually has a lot of features in the settings, but the application itself isn't very cluttered. I particularly like the car mode since I listen to most of my podcasts in the car, and the app is continually maintained and updated. Great choice for a reliable, unobtrusive podcast player.

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Glad to know this app works very well for you. Enjoy your listening!

author: Geoffrey Duke
comment: This app has lots of features, but it gets the important ones done in a clean and intuitive user experience. It gives me control over when to download (use WiFi, not cellular data) and where to save (SD card).

reply.author: Podcast Republic
reply.content: Thanks very much for your feedback. Glad to hear this app works very well for you. Enjoy your listening!

comment: Only weakness is that its not running in a browser as well. Otherwise excellent.
